Description: Design and build backend services using Python and Go. Work with AWS, Docker, and Kubernetes. Develop REST APIs and collaborate with product teams to deliver scalable systems.
Analyze large datasets using SQL and Python. Build machine learning models with scikit-learn and PyTorch. Communicate insights through dashboards and reports.
Develop and deploy machine learning pipelines. Experience with TensorFlow, model training, and inference. Optimize performance for production environments.
Build distributed systems and APIs using Java and Spring Boot. Work with PostgreSQL, Redis, and Kafka. Focus on reliability, scalability, and system performance.
Develop web applications using React, TypeScript, and Node.js. Design backend services and integrate RESTful APIs. Collaborate closely with designers and stakeholders.
Design and implement security controls across cloud infrastructure. Experience with IAM, vulnerability management, and monitoring. Knowledge of AWS security services is preferred.
Build and maintain data pipelines using Spark and Airflow. Work with ETL processes, data warehouses, and cloud storage. Ensure data quality and reliability.
Develop AI-powered applications using large language models. Experience with prompt engineering, model evaluation, and API integration. Familiarity with Python and cloud deployment.
Automate infrastructure using Terraform and CI/CD pipelines. Manage Kubernetes clusters and cloud resources. Focus on monitoring, observability, and system uptime.
Contribute to core platform services written in C++ and Python. Work on performance optimization, system design, and large-scale backend components.
